name: NSBatchDeleteRequest
desc: A request that deletes objects in the SQLite persistent store without loading them into memory.

items.name: init(fetchRequest: NSFetchRequest<NSFetchRequestResult>)
items.desc: Creates a request that deletes the results of the specified fetch request.

items.name: init(objectIDs: [NSManagedObjectID])
items.desc: Creates a request that deletes the managed objects with the specified identifiers.

items.name: var fetchRequest: NSFetchRequest<NSFetchRequestResult>
items.desc: The fetch request that identifies the managed objects to delete.

items.name: var resultType: NSBatchDeleteRequestResultType
items.desc: The type of result the request provides when it executes.

items.name: enum NSBatchDeleteRequestResultType
items.desc: The types of result a batch delete request can provide when it executes.
